targets.query:
from(bucket: "monitoring_op")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "procstat" and r.host =~ /${host:pipe}/ and r._field == "memory_rss" and r.process_name == "telegraf")
  |> range($range)
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value", "host"])

from(bucket: "monitoring_op")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "procstat" and r.host =~ /${host:pipe}/ and r._field == "cpu_usage" and r.process_name == "telegraf")
  |> range($range)
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value", "host"])

from(bucket: "monitoring_op")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "procstat" and r.host =~ /${host:pipe}/ and r._field == "num_fds" and r.process_name == "telegraf")
  |> range($range)
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value", "host"])

from(bucket: "monitoring_op")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "tsdb_telegraf_internal_gather" and r.input == "influxdb_listener" and r._field == "metrics_gathered")
  |> range($range)
  |> derivative(nonNegative: true, unit:5m)
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "tag", "_value", "host", "input"])

from(bucket: "monitoring_op")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "tsdb_telegraf_internal_write" and r.output == "influxdb" and r._field == "metrics_written" and r.output == "influxdb")
  |> range($range)
  |> derivative(nonNegative: true, unit:5m)
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "tag", "_value", "host"])

panels.title: Metrics Sent to InfluxDB in 5 mintues

targets.query:
from(bucket: "monitoring_op")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "tsdb_telegraf_internal_write" and r.output == "influxdb" and r._field == "metrics_dropped" and r.output == "influxdb")
  |> range($range)
  |> derivative(nonNegative: true, unit:5m)
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "tag", "_value", "host"])

from(bucket: "monitoring_op")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "tsdb_telegraf_internal_gather" and r.input == "influxdb" and r._field == "gather_time_ns")
  |> range($range)
  |> derivative(nonNegative: true, unit:5m)
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "tag", "_value", "host", "input"])

from(bucket: "monitoring_op")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "tsdb_telegraf_internal_write" and r.output == "influxdb" and r._field == "write_time_ns")
  |> range($range)
  |> derivative(nonNegative: true, unit:5m)
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "tag", "_value", "host", "output"])

panels.title: Time to Write Metrics to InfluxDB

targets.query:
from(bucket: "monitoring_op")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "tsdb_telegraf_internal_write" and r._field == "buffer_size" and r.output == "influxdb")
  |> range($range)
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "tag", "_value", "host"])

from(bucket: "monitoring_op")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "procstat" and r._field == "memory_rss" and r.process_name == "influxd")
  |> range($range)
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value", "host"])

from(bucket: "monitoring_op")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "procstat" and r._field == "cpu_usage" and r.process_name == "influxd")
  |> range($range)
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value", "host"])

from(bucket: "monitoring_op")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "procstat" and r._field == "num_fds" and r.process_name == "influxd")
  |> range($range)
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value", "host"])

from(bucket: "monitoring_op")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "tsdb_influxdb_database" and r._field == "numMeasurements")
  |> range($range)
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value", "host", "database"])

from(bucket: "monitoring_op")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "tsdb_influxdb_database" and r._field == "numSeries")
  |> range($range)
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value", "host", "database"])

from(bucket: "monitoring_op")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "disk" and (r._field == "used" or r._field == "free") and r.host =~ /influxdb/ and r.path == "/pv")
  |> range($range)
  |> keep(columns: ["_start", "_stop", "_time", "_value", "host", "_field"])

from(bucket: "monitoring_main")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "tsdb_influxdb_httpd" and r._field == "pointsWrittenOK")
  |> range($range)
  |> derivative(nonNegative: true, unit:1s)
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value", "host"])

from(bucket: "monitoring_op")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "procstat" and r._field == "read_bytes" and r.process_name == "influxd")
  |> range($range)
  |> derivative(nonNegative: true, unit:1s)
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value", "host", "_field"])

from(bucket: "monitoring_op")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "procstat" and r._field == "write_bytes" and r.process_name == "influxd")
  |> range($range)
  |> derivative(nonNegative: true, unit:1s)
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value", "host", "_field"])

from(bucket: "monitoring_op")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "tsdb_influxdb_queryExecutor" and r._field == "queriesExecuted")
  |> range($range)
  |> derivative(nonNegative: true, unit:5m)
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value", "host"])

from(bucket: "monitoring_main")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "tsdb_influxdb_httpd" and r._field == "writeReqBytes")
  |> range($range)
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value", "host"])

panels.title: Data Ingest Rate over HTTP, bytes per second

targets.query:
from(bucket: "monitoring_op")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "procstat" and r.host =~ /${host:pipe}/ and r._field == "memory_rss" and r.process_name == "fluxd")
  |> range($range)
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value", "host"])

from(bucket: "monitoring_op")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "procstat" and r.host =~ /${host:pipe}/ and r._field == "cpu_usage" and r.process_name == "fluxd")
  |> range($range)
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value", "host"])

from(bucket: "monitoring_op")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "procstat" and r.host =~ /${host:pipe}/ and r._field == "num_fds" and r.process_name == "fluxd")
  |> range($range)
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value", "host"])

from(bucket: "monitoring_op")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "tsdb_fluxd_http_api_requests_total" and r.path =~ /query/)
  |> range($range)
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value", "address", "status", "path"])
  |> derivative(nonNegative: true, unit:5m)
  |> drop(columns: ["path"])
  |> window(every:5m)
  |> sum()
  |> rename(columns: {_start: "_time"})
  |> group(columns:["address", "status"])

sum = from(bucket: "monitoring_op")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "tsdb_fluxd_http_api_request_duration_seconds" and r._field == "sum" and r.path == "/query")
  |> range($range)
  |> derivative(nonNegative: true, unit:5m)
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_start", "_stop", "address", "status", "_value"])
  
count = from(bucket: "monitoring_op")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "tsdb_fluxd_http_api_request_duration_seconds" and r._field == "count" and r.path == "/query")
  |> range($range)
  |> derivative(nonNegative: true, unit:5m)
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_start", "_stop", "address", "status", "_value"])

join(tables: {sum:sum, count:count}, on: ["_time", "_start", "_stop", "address", "status"])
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({_value: r._value_sum / r._value_count, _time: r._time}))

from(bucket: "monitoring_op")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "tsdb_fluxd_host_state")
  |> range($range)
  |> group(columns: ["_time","address"], mode:"by")
  |> sum()
  |> group(columns: ["address"], mode:"by")

from(bucket: "monitoring_op")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "tsdb_fluxd_host_state_change_total" and r.status =="DISCONNECTED")
  |> range($range)
  |> keep(columns: ["_time","_start", "_stop","_value", "address","hostport"])
  |> difference()
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_value"] > 0)

panels.description:
- Number of single InfluxDB selections in 5 minutes
- Number of failed selections caused by expired host selection data

targets.query:
from(bucket: "monitoring_op")
|> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "tsdb_fluxd_host_selected" and r._field == "counter")
|> range($range)
|> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value", "address", "hostport"])
|> difference(nonNegative: true)
|> fill(column: "_value", value: 0)
|> drop(columns: ["hostport"])
|> window(every:5m)
|> sum()
|> rename(columns: {_start: "_time"})
|> group(columns: ["address"])
|> set(key: "_field", value: "Successful")

from(bucket: "monitoring_op")
|> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "tsdb_fluxd_hl_expired_detected" and r._field == "counter" and r.host =~ /${host:pipe}/)
|> range($range)
|> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value", "address"])
|> difference(nonNegative: true)
|> fill(column: "_value", value: 0)
|> set(key: "_field", value: "Failed due to expired data")

panels.title: Number of InfluxDB Selections in 5 Minutes

panels.description: Number of queries executed on local Flux engine

targets.query:
from(bucket: "monitoring_op")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "tsdb_fluxd_query_control_executing_duration_seconds" and r._field =~ /count/)
  |> range($range)
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value", "address"])
  |> derivative(nonNegative: true, unit:5m)

panels.title: Number of Queries Executed in 5 minutes

panels.description: Number of queries forwarded and executed on remote Fluxd instances

targets.query:
from(bucket: "monitoring_op")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "tsdb_fluxd_http_lb_request_forwarded" and r._field =~ /count/)
  |> range($range)
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value", "address"])
  |> derivative(nonNegative: true, unit:5m)

panels.title: Number of Queries Forwarded in 5 minutes

panels.description: Total number of internal fluxd errors (internal panics counter)

targets.query:
from(bucket: "monitoring_op") 
   |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "tsdb_fluxd_query_control_panics_total" and r._field == "counter")
   |> range($range)
   |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value", "address"])

panels.title: Flux Internal Errors

targets.query:
from(bucket: "monitoring_op")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "procstat" and r.host =~ /${host:pipe}/ and r._field == "memory_rss" and (r.process_name == "throttler" or r.process_name == "grafana-server"))
  |> range($range)
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value", "host", "process_name"])

from(bucket: "monitoring_op")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "procstat" and r.host =~ /${host:pipe}/ and r._field == "cpu_usage" and (r.process_name == "throttler" or r.process_name == "grafana-server"))
  |> range($range)
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value", "host", "process_name"])

from(bucket: "monitoring_op")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "procstat" and r.host =~ /${host:pipe}/ and r._field == "num_fds" and (r.process_name == "throttler" or r.process_name == "grafana-server"))
  |> range($range)
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value", "host", "process_name"])

from(bucket: "monitoring_op")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "cquerier_fluxd_requests_total")
  |> range($range)
  |> difference(nonNegative:true)
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value", "type", "host", "status"])

from(bucket: "monitoring_op")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "cquerier_telegraf_requests_total")
  |> range($range)
  |> difference(nonNegative:true)
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value", "type", "host", "status"])

from(bucket: "monitoring_vdc")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement =~ /^cq_.*_metadata$/ and r._field == "_done")
  |> range($range)
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value", "_measurement"])

panels.title: CQ progress done status by name

targets.query:
from(bucket: "monitoring_op")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "cquerier_succeeded_cq_total" and r.type == "current")
  |> range($range)
  |> difference(nonNegative:true)
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value", "cqname"])

panels.title: Number of successfully processed "current" CQ by name

targets.query:
from(bucket: "monitoring_op")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "cquerier_succeeded_cq_total" and r.type == "history")
  |> range($range)
  |> difference(nonNegative:true)
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value", "cqname", "type"])

panels.title: Number of successfully processed "history" CQ by name

targets.query:
from(bucket: "monitoring_op")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "cquerier_exceeded_maxretry_total")
  |> range($range)
  |> keep(columns: ["_time","_value", "host", "cqname"]) 
  |> derivative(nonNegative: true, unit: 5m)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_value"] > 0)

panels.title: Number of CQ exceeded max-retry count per 5 min, per query

targets.query:
from(bucket: "monitoring_op")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "cquerier_fluxd_requests_total" and r.status!="ok")
  |> range($range)
  |> difference()
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value", "host", "status", "type"])
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_value"] > 0)

panels.title: CQ number of bad requests to Fluxd

targets.query:
from(bucket: "monitoring_op")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "cquerier_exceeded_maxretry_common_total")
  |> range($range)
  |> keep(columns: ["_time","_value", "host"])
  |> derivative(nonNegative: true, unit: 5m)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_value"] > 0)

panels.title: Number of CQ exceeded max-retry count per 5 min

targets.query:
from(bucket: "monitoring_op")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "cquerier_non_completed_history_cq_total")
  |> range($range)
  |> difference(nonNegative:true)
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value", "host"])

panels.title: CQ number of  non completed history processing

from(bucket: "monitoring_op")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement =~ /_stat_client_performance$/ and r._field == "primitives_count" and r.host =~ /${host:pipe}/)
  |> range($range)
  |> drop(columns: ["_measurement", "_field", "node_id", "tag", "host", "_start", "_stop"])

from(bucket: "monitoring_op")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement =~ /_stat_client_performance$/ and r._field == "exported_points" and r.host =~ /${host:pipe}/)
  |> range($range)
  |> drop(columns: ["_measurement", "_field", "node_id", "tag", "host", "_start", "_stop"])
  |> derivative(nonNegative: true)

from(bucket: "monitoring_op")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement =~ /_stat_client_performance$/ and r._field == "influxdb_buffer_loss" and r.host =~ /${host:pipe}/)
  |> range($range)
  |> drop(columns: ["_measurement", "_field", "node_id", "tag", "host", "_start", "_stop"])
  |> difference(nonNegative:true)

from(bucket: "monitoring_op")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement =~ /_stat_client_performance$/ and r._field == "push_interval_sec" and r.host =~ /${host:pipe}/)
  |> range($range)
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value", "process"])

from(bucket: "monitoring_op")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "procstat" and r._field == "memory_rss" and r.process_name == "rsyslogd")
  |> range($range)
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value", "host"])

from(bucket: "monitoring_op")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "procstat" and r._field == "cpu_usage" and r.process_name == "rsyslogd")
  |> range($range)
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value", "host"])

from(bucket: "monitoring_op")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "procstat" and r._field == "num_fds" and r.process_name == "rsyslogd")
  |> range($range)
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value", "host"])

from(bucket: "monitoring_op")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "procstat" and r._field == "read_bytes" and r.process_name == "rsyslogd")
  |> range($range)
  |> derivative(nonNegative: true, unit:1s)
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value", "host", "_field"])

from(bucket: "monitoring_op")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "procstat" and r._field == "write_bytes" and r.process_name == "rsyslogd")
  |> range($range)
  |> derivative(nonNegative: true, unit:1s)
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value", "host", "_field"])

from(bucket: "monitoring_op")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "disk" and (r._field == "used" or r._field == "free") and r.host =~ /rsyslog/ and r.path == "/pv")
  |> range($range)
  |> keep(columns: ["_start", "_stop", "_time", "_value", "host", "_field"])
